Help:Node.title: Help Index
Help:Node.Log:Description:
Thank you for asking for help. There are a variety of help resources available.
There are help files available on:
* $(udat.chatchar)@help basics - help for the new player
* $(udat.chatchar)@help concepts - help on general concepts
* $(udat.chatchar)@help topics - list of all help topics
* $(udat.chatchar)@help [command] - help on a specific command
In addition, the following help related commands may be useful:
* $(udat.chatchar)@tip - gives you a new tip from the tips database
* $(udat.chatchar)@assist "[message]"- requests personal assistance from any available StoryGuide or StoryHost.
